title: Megachile davidsoni
content:
Megachile davidsoni is a species of bee in the family Megachilidae.[2] It was described by Theodore Dru Alison Cockerell in 1902.[2]

Megachile davidsoni can be found in the south-west of California, United States.[3]

This Megachile-related article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
